name: The end of violence
desc: Please call me the dunk king. Improve the chance of dunking and the success rate of dunking.

name: Spring man
desc: With amazing bouncing power, you can jump and dunk farther away.

name: Perseverance
desc: It is easier to enter the "full firepower" state and greatly extend the time.

name: Anti-interference
desc: Even if there are defenders around, the shot will not be seriously disturbed.

name: Ball master
desc: Improve the ability to protect the ball, and can relay the air relay!

name: Stadium Overlord
desc: Who can stop me? When dribbling, he is good at pushing opponents violently.

name: Steady shot
desc: Archer's basic literacy! Have better shooting stability.

name: Unlimited range
desc: Good at shooting long distances and can shoot from a very far position

name: Back jumper
desc: The best scoring technique of the Viper is to lean back and shoot to reduce defensive interference.

name: Ultra-long-range missile
desc: A Meng can shoot from a very far position! But easy to shake hands~

name: Eating physique
desc: Pandaren lasts for a long time and turns on fire! But because of laziness, it takes longer to accumulate energy.

name: Terrible hot pot
desc: The Eastern Giants have a terrible blocking ability and are good at guarding the rim.

name: Domineering dunk
desc: The Eastern Giants have a height advantage and are difficult to stop when dunking.
